_header: In prophecy thus it is said
Subjects: prophecies; carols, of the Passion; Simeon
_description: James Ryman, The prophecy of Simeon — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Mary so myelde alone / For her chielde made grete mone’

CULEe112.First Lines:
In prophesy thus it is saideThe whiche no wyse may be
                    denayde…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …As vnto hym that died thooTo save mankyende alone
